scripts.scss: mkdir -p dist/css && node-sass --output-style compressed src/css/ --output dist/css/
scripts.autoprefixer: mkdir -p dist/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --config autoprefixer-config.json --dir dist/css/ dist/css/*.css
scripts.uglify: parallelshell 'uglifyjs dist/js/home.js --mangle --compress --output dist/js/home.js' 'uglifyjs dist/js/project-detail.js --mangle --compress --output dist/js/project-detail.js' 'uglifyjs dist/js/inline-head.js --mangle --compress --output dist/js/inline-head.js' 'uglifyjs dist/js/inline-body.js --mangle --compress --output dist/js/inline-body.js'
scripts.browserify: mkdir -p dist/js && parallelshell 'browserify src/js/home.js -o dist/js/home.js' 'browserify src/js/project-detail.js -o dist/js/project-detail.js' 'cp src/js/inline-head.js dist/js/inline-head.js' 'browserify src/js/inline-body.js -o dist/js/inline-body.js'
scripts.icons: svgo -f src/images/icons -o dist/images/icons  && svg-sprite-generate -d dist/images/icons -o dist/images/icons.svg
scripts.serve: browser-sync start --server dist/ --files 'dist/index.html, dist/css/*.css, dist/js/*.js, dist/images/**/*.*'
scripts.build:html: node build-html.js && gulp inlineJs && npm run build:i18n
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.build:raster-images: grunt responsive_images && node build-project-thumb-sprite.js && imagemin dist/images/ dist/images/ -p && cp src/images/inside_logo.png dist/images/inside_logo.png
scripts.build:images: npm run build:raster-images && npm run icons
scripts.build:all: parallelshell 'npm run build:css' 'npm run build:font' 'npm run build:js && npm run build:html' 'npm run build:images' 'npm run build:favicon'
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:font' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:inline-js' 'npm run watch:images' 'npm run watch:favicon'
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && npm run build:all && echo insideinterior.net > dist/CNAME && cp src/robots.txt dist/robots.txt && cp src/sitemap.xml dist/sitemap.xml && cp src/googlec5278b6f78ca25bf.html dist/googlec5278b6f78ca25bf.html && npm run watch:all
scripts.deploy: git checkout master && git subtree split --prefix dist -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages
